cta.title: A new way to explore the world
cta.paragraph: For decades travellers have reached for Lonely Planet books when looking to plan and execute their perfect trip, but now, they can also let Lonely Planet Experiences lead the way

guide.title: Guides by Thousand Sunny
guide.paragraph: Packed with tips and advice from our on-the-ground experts, our city guides app (iOS and Android) is the ultimate resource before and during a trip.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.quote: Quisque in lacus a urna fermentum euismod. Integer mi nibh, dapibus ac scelerisque eu, facilisis quis purus. Morbi blandit sit amet turpis nec
testimonials.name: Aleksey Smirnov
